participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, enjoys spending time with family and engaging in community activities.
participant_1.background: i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and analytical, loves the outdoors and has a passion for engineering.
participant_2.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i am a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. i live in colorado.
